attributes.action: Encorage  Amnesty International to listen to its Members whom not accomodate Abortion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cardinal O"Brien and Catholic members dedicated to the rights of people tortured, jailed and abused by corrupt regimes, have now been forced to Resign from Amnesty International.
In conscience Christians cannot support any organisation, no matter how good if they ignore the fundamental Right to Life of innocent young babies in a Mother"s Womb.
Amnesty International"s founding member was a convert to the Catholic Faith, Mr Peter Benenson.
Once again it shows that good intentioned organisatios can be corrupted from within.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
